product_name: New Balance Fresh Foam 980 Road-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: Developed using specialized design software, the New Balance Fresh Foam 980 Road-Running Shoes feature breathable air mesh and simple no-sew overlays that wrap the feet in the right places. 4mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. Fresh Foam midsole, a performance midsole compound, delivers plush cushioning to runners who want a lower, more natural underfoot feel. Medial post consists of higher-density compression-molded EVA, located on inside edge of shoe, to help prevent over-pronation. A full-ground-contact, blown rubber outsole complements the shoe's cushioning and delivers a smooth ride. No-sew material application; breathable air mesh upper.
short_description: Developed using specialized design software, the New Balance Fresh Foam 980 Road-Running Shoes feature breathable air mesh and simple no-sew overlays that wrap the feet in the right places.
